You will be given a major overview of all of Photoshop's tools, filters, features, and workspace so that you can quickly begin working on your next project.

items.headline: VLSI - Analyse your chip timing for free
objectives_summary: Students will be able to do a real full chip static timing analysis with $0 spent, as designs and tools used in this course are opensource
Students will be able to appreciate power of opensource EDA tools, like Opentimer used in this course, and help in contributing towards the development
Students can explore commercial tools with knowledge and concepts from this course, quite easily
